plugin.name: ThunderSTORM
plugin.author: George
plugin.description: Comprehensive ThunderSTORM implementation for FLIKA providing Single Molecule Localization Microscopy (SMLM) analysis with advanced detection, fitting, super-resolution rendering, and automated testing capabilities.
plugin.long_description: ThunderSTORM for FLIKA brings comprehensive SMLM analysis to the FLIKA platform. Features include multiple image filtering methods (wavelet, Gaussian, DoG), advanced molecule detection algorithms, PSF fitting with LSQ/WLSQ/MLE/Radial Symmetry methods, post-processing tools for quality filtering and drift correction, multiple super-resolution rendering techniques, and simulation tools for testing and validation. NEW: Includes automated testing framework with ground truth validation for comprehensive system validation. Perfect for PALM, STORM, and other single-molecule imaging modalities.
